title: Where are my skins at?
body: So i updated the game, but when i go to look through my Poppy skins (I bought Noxus and Blacksmith ages before the rework) and i only see Battle Regalia and Scarlet Hammer. What happened to the rest of the skins?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is only a visual issue in the Champion Details Page. You content is still unlocked, and you're still able to use it in game! We're investigating the issue.
Can you please add a feature to lets say the collection section so we can see all the skins currently own?
All the other skins are legacy.
Ok, but i still owned them before the rework. Why are they missing if i already bought them?

> [{quoted}](name=Larkin1022,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=YYcVRuAz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-09T18:57:29.799+0000)
>
> Ok, but i still owned them before the rework. Why are they missing if i already bought them?

Sometime it bugs, try go into a custom game and you will see it in champ select.

Edit: Just tested it, you will see it in champ select.


http://www.auplod.com/u/daopul5c344.png
Thanks, just did it myself. Was worried there for a bit lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Larkin1022,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=YYcVRuAz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-09T18:57:29.799+0000)
>
> Ok, but i still owned them before the rework. Why are they missing if i already bought them?

E-mail Riot support. Take a screen grab of your screen without the skin tabs, and IDK how far purchase history goes back but if you have those skins listed in there grab that, too.

Have you tried checking in game for them?

Good luck finding your missing skins :( I hope they come back!
oh you cant see them in champ profiles you can still pick them in champ select and ingame, this is a know bug
This seems to be happening with other {{champion:78}} players as well... Don't worry, though, I'm sure they're working on resolving the issue!

if you want to buy ALL  the skins a bundle is coming 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/poppy-heroically-charges-live
if you want to buy retired skins one by one you have to w8 longer
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/caution-snowstorm-sale-incoming
